Title: Point
Description: For type 'Point', the `coordinates` field is a single position.

Title: MultiPoint
Description: For type 'MultiPoint', the `coordinates` field is an array of positions.

Title: LineString
Description: For type 'LineString', the `coordinates` field is an array of two or more positions.

Title: MultiLineString
Description: For type 'MultiLineString', the `coordinates` field is an array of LineString coordinate arrays.

Title: Polygon
Description: For type 'Polygon', the `coordinates` field is an array of linear ring coordinate arrays.

Title: MultiPolygon
Description: For type 'MultiPolygon', the `coordinates` field is an array of Polygon coordinate arrays.
